description:
On a hunt for answers to a burning question about Ryoko’s past, Ryoshi learns he must gain her trust and ask her himself. Ringo recalls how she and Ryoko met, and the conflict that sparked Ryoko’s ravenous need for strength.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Okami-san and Akazukin-chan, and While We`re at It, Ryoshi-kun
Ookami-san to Akazukin-chan, Tsuide ni Ryoushi-kun
おおかみさんと赤ずきんちゃん, ついでに亮士くん
